crowdtangle.post/message: For September, China’s imports surged 13.2% in U.S. dollar terms, according to official customs data on Tuesday. That was far above the 0.3% predicted by the Reuters’ poll. Exports rose 9.9% from a year ago — close to analysts’ expectations of 10%, according to a Reuters poll. Trade data for September in U.S. dollar-terms showed China’s imports surged, well above expectations, while exports grew largely as forecast.
crowdtangle.post/allText: For September, China’s imports surged 13.2% in U.S. dollar terms, according to official customs data on Tuesday. That was far above the 0.3% predicted by the Reuters’ poll. Exports rose 9.9% from a year ago — close to analysts’ expectations of 10%, according to a Reuters poll. Trade data for September in U.S. dollar-terms showed China’s imports surged, well above expectations, while exports grew largely as forecast. China's imports surged 13.2% in U.S. dollar-terms in September, while exports rose 9.9%.
combined/text: For September, China’s imports surged 13.2% in U.S. dollar terms, according to official customs data on Tuesday. That was far above the 0.3% predicted by the Reuters’ poll. Exports rose 9.9% from a year ago — close to analysts’ expectations of 10%, according to a Reuters poll. Trade data for September in U.S. dollar-terms showed China’s imports surged, well above expectations, while exports grew largely as forecast.

crowdtangle.post/message: China and Indonesia have vowed to strengthen cooperation on COVID-19 vaccine during talks between Chinese State Councilor and Foreign Minister Wang Yi and Luhut Binsar Pandjaitan, Indonesian President's special envoy and the country's Coordinator for Cooperation with China. crowdtangle.post/message: Yesterday we told you about the importance of the moon for the #midautumnfestival. That brings us on to the food of the festival - Mooncakes! Sign us up 😋🥮🥮🥮🌓🎉

crowdtangle.post/message: More Chinese enterprises are taking the lead in China's supply-side reform and economic upgrading with more investment in research and development, according to this year's list of top 500 Chinese enterprises.The number of enterprises with a revenue of more than 100 billion yuan (about 14.7 billion U.S. dollars) reached 217 this year, rising from 194 last year. The revenue combined reached 69.78 trillion yuan, taking up 81.12 percent of the total.

crowdtangle.post/message: The yak cheese, a distinctive food handmade by Tibetans, has helped lift local people out of poverty in Nagqu, southwest China's Tibet Autonomous Region. The yak cheese, made from fresh yak milk, is often seen as a snack and favored by local people, especially herdsmen. It's one of the main products made by local cooperatives, raising villagers' income considerably. Yak cheese is often made by hand. When the yak milk is heated, it turns into curds. Local people will keep kneading the curds along the pot and wash it in whey that has been separated from the milk. The whole process makes it elastic and sticky. While it is still hot, the cheese will be shaped into long, thin pieces. After air drying, the yak cheese is done. The technique of making the yak cheese was listed as one of the intangible cultural heritage in Tibet Autonomous Region in 2019. #TastyChina

While it is still hot, the cheese will be shaped into long, thin pieces. After air drying, the yak cheese is done. crowdtangle.post/message: China, South Sudan ink deal to construct key bridge - JUBA, Sept. 24 (Xinhua) -- South Sudan on Thursday signed a deal with the Chinese government that will lead to construction of the Jur River bridge linking Juba to the Bahr El Ghazal region and its northern neighbor Sudan. Simon Mijok Mijak, Minister of Roads and Bridges said the project will be funded through a grant from the Chinese government. "This is a great day for the people of South Sudan and Greater Bahr El Ghazal and Western Bahr El Ghazal in particular, today we have signed a supplementary agreement on the implementation of Jur River bridge in Wau. This was one of the pledges of President Salva Kiir during his visit in October 2013 to Western Bahr El Ghazal," Mijak told journalists in Juba during the signing ceremony. He disclosed that during President Salva Kiir's visit to Beijing, the Chinese government agreed to support the construction of the Jur River Bridge, in an effort to develop the youngest nation. The initial agreement was signed in August 2019, and this latest is necessary to speed implementation of the work, according to Mijak. "The signing of today is a cornerstone of our strong and unshakeable relationship between South Sudan and China. This is another tremendous achievement of the government for the people of South Sudan," said Mijak. Hua Ning, Chinese ambassador to South Sudan, said the support from China demonstrates Beijing's commitment toward the future development of South Sudan. "Today, I am very pleased to join the signing ceremony of the Jur River Bridge Project, which demonstrates the Chinese government's firm commitment to the future development of our cooperation, friendship and our support for the long-term development of South Sudan," said Hua. He disclosed that the project is already underway with the first shipment of construction materials arriving from China. Hua added that the project will play a key role in connecting people in Bahr El Ghazal region, promoting local trade, business and transportation. He noted that China will continue to support South Sudan's economic recovery and development besides offering humanitarian aid. "We are glad to see the South Sudanese government has established an economic crisis management committee, and China is happy to extend her helping hand for the economic recovery and we are also mobilizing necessary resources for the future development of South Sudan's economy," said Hua. He said that bridges and highways are essential for stimulating economic growth and attracting foreign direct investments to South Sudan. "China is now boasting the largest highway network and we have built a lot of great bridges. We very much wish to share our knowledge and expertise with our South Sudanese counterparts. We hope that the roads and bridges will bring more benefits to the local people while we continue to advance the peace process," said Hua. Enditem
crowdtangle.post/allText: China, South Sudan ink deal to construct key bridge - JUBA, Sept. 24 (Xinhua) -- South Sudan on Thursday signed a deal with the Chinese government that will lead to construction of the Jur River bridge linking Juba to the Bahr El Ghazal region and its northern neighbor Sudan. Simon Mijok Mijak, Minister of Roads and Bridges said the project will be funded through a grant from the Chinese government. "This is a great day for the people of South Sudan and Greater Bahr El Ghazal and Western Bahr El Ghazal in particular, today we have signed a supplementary agreement on the implementation of Jur River bridge in Wau. This was one of the pledges of President Salva Kiir during his visit in October 2013 to Western Bahr El Ghazal," Mijak told journalists in Juba during the signing ceremony. He disclosed that during President Salva Kiir's visit to Beijing, the Chinese government agreed to support the construction of the Jur River Bridge, in an effort to develop the youngest nation. The initial agreement was signed in August 2019, and this latest is necessary to speed implementation of the work, according to Mijak. "The signing of today is a cornerstone of our strong and unshakeable relationship between South Sudan and China. This is another tremendous achievement of the government for the people of South Sudan," said Mijak. Hua Ning, Chinese ambassador to South Sudan, said the support from China demonstrates Beijing's commitment toward the future development of South Sudan. "Today, I am very pleased to join the signing ceremony of the Jur River Bridge Project, which demonstrates the Chinese government's firm commitment to the future development of our cooperation, friendship and our support for the long-term development of South Sudan," said Hua. He disclosed that the project is already underway with the first shipment of construction materials arriving from China. Hua added that the project will play a key role in connecting people in Bahr El Ghazal region, promoting local trade, business and transportation. He noted that China will continue to support South Sudan's economic recovery and development besides offering humanitarian aid. "We are glad to see the South Sudanese government has established an economic crisis management committee, and China is happy to extend her helping hand for the economic recovery and we are also mobilizing necessary resources for the future development of South Sudan's economy," said Hua. He said that bridges and highways are essential for stimulating economic growth and attracting foreign direct investments to South Sudan. "China is now boasting the largest highway network and we have built a lot of great bridges. We very much wish to share our knowledge and expertise with our South Sudanese counterparts. We hope that the roads and bridges will bring more benefits to the local people while we continue to advance the peace process," said Hua. Enditem

crowdtangle.post/message: Remarks by the Spokesperson of the Embassy of the People’s Republic of China in Barbados Recently there is a fabricated accusation that China has pressured Barbados to become a Republic. The Spokesperson of the Embassy of the People’s Republic of China in Barbados makes remarks as the following: The accusation is totally groundless and ridiculous. Barbados is an independent sovereign state. It is totally the internal affairs of Barbados to adopt what kind of form of government, it is up to the government and the people of Barbados. No foreign country has the right to intervene. China remains firm in its commitment to strengthening friendship and cooperation with Barbados on the basis of mutual respect for sovereignty and territorial integrity, mutual non-aggression, non-interference in each other's internal affairs, equality and mutual benefit, and peaceful coexistence, which is in accordance with the benefit of the two countries and two peoples. Any attempt to undermine the friendship between China and Barbados will not succeed. It is now the 21st century, rather than the 20th century, not even the 17th century, and those who are clinging to the mindset of colonialism should wake up.

crowdtangle.post/message: #EveryTreasureTellsAStory #TigerTally The Tiger Tally first appeared in the Spring and Autumn Period and the Warring States Period. It is the symbol of military power in ancient China. It was recorded that the Tiger Tally was issued by the central government to a general in charge of the troops. The tally was divided into two parts with inscriptions at the back. The right part was kept by the central government, and the left one by the general commander, when combining together the army could be mobilized.
crowdtangle.post/allText: #EveryTreasureTellsAStory #TigerTally The Tiger Tally first appeared in the Spring and Autumn Period and the Warring States Period. It is the symbol of military power in ancient China. It was recorded that the Tiger Tally was issued by the central government to a general in charge of the troops. The tally was divided into two parts with inscriptions at the back. The right part was kept by the central government, and the left one by the general commander, when combining together the army could be mobilized. + 如 部 X 會 尼 业 料 小木 The inscription comprise 40 characters inlaid with gold. Exquisite workmanship and beautiful strokes. 知 中
combined/text: #EveryTreasureTellsAStory #TigerTally The Tiger Tally first appeared in the Spring and Autumn Period and the Warring States Period. It is the symbol of military power in ancient China. crowdtangle.post/message: The documentary records the initial outbreak and the following two months in Wuhan and how a city of 11 million came to a standstill. Check out to see how the city rises from ashes.
crowdtangle.post/allText: The documentary records the initial outbreak and the following two months in Wuhan and how a city of 11 million came to a standstill. Check out to see how the city rises from ashes. The novel coronavirus pandemic is the largest global health crisis of the past decades, and China was the first country to be hit by #COVID19. When the lives of 1.4 billion people were put under threat by the virus, China locked down Wuhan, once the epicenter of the coronavirus outbreak in the country. But how did the virus spread throughout the city? And what led to the unprecedented lockdown? CGTN launches "The Frontline: China's Fight Against COVID-19", a 90-minute-long two-part documentary. In part one, the initial outbreak and the following two months are explored, and how a city of 11 million came to a standstill.
combined/text: The documentary records the initial outbreak and the following two months in Wuhan and how a city of 11 million came to a standstill. Check out to see how the city rises from ashes.

crowdtangle.post/message: The China-Europe freight trains play a pivotal role in land transport, as the pandemic severely hits international transport, First launched in 2011 in Chongqing, the China-Europe freight trains are running more frequently than ever this year, ensuring trade and transport of epidemic prevention materials in both directions. By the end of July, the China-Europe cargo train service had delivered 39,000 tonnes of goods for epidemic prevention. The number of China-Europe freight trains hit a record high of 1,247 in August alone, up 62% year on year, transporting 113,000 TEUs of goods, an increase of 66%. Trains from China carry goods like daily necessities, equipment, medical supplies and vehicles while trains from Europe to China transport milk powder, wine and automobile parts among other products.

crowdtangle.post/message: Foreign Ministry Spokesperson Zhao Lijian's Regular Press Conference on September 10 2020/09/10 CNR: According to the latest data yesterday, the number of China-Europe Railway Express travelling to and from Europe and the shipment volume registered balanced growth, all up over 60% compared with a year earlier. Do you have any comment? Zhao Lijian: International transportation has been severely impacted amid COVID-19 since this year. The China-Europe freight train service has played a pivotal role in land transportation, serving as a channel of life and bond connecting all. In August this year, the China-Europe freight trains have maintained strong growth. The number of trains and the volume of goods delivered hit a record high of 1247 and 110,000 TEUs respectively, up by 62 percent and 66 year on year. The fully loaded container ratio reached 98.5 percent. The COVID-19 pandemic further highlights the win-win nature of the China-Europe freight train service as well as the Belt and Road cooperation's feature of shared benefits through joint consultation and contribution. The China-Europe freight trains have not only kept sending urgently needed anti-epidemic supplies and industrial goods and daily used products, but also deliver a large number of quality products to China. They help countries along the route to resume production and work and reopen economy, provide strong driving force for stabilizing global industrial and supply chain and bring new opportunity for global economic recovery and development. The growth of China-Europe freight train service once again indicates that economic globalization is an irreversible trend of the times as countries are economically interdependent with unprecedented integration of interests. China stands ready to work with the European side to improve the capacity and effectiveness of China-Europe freight trains, continue to expand logistics cooperation between China and the European side and other countries along the route and make new contribution to global COVID-19 cooperation and high quality BRI cooperation.

crowdtangle.post/message: Zhang Dingyu: I am a patient, also a doctor Dr. Zhang Dingyu, one of the "People's Hero," is the head of Wuhan's designated coronavirus-treating Jinyintan Hospital who led the allocation and treatment work for over 2,800 COVID-19 patients. Zhang himself suffers from the amyotrophic lateral sclerosis (ALS), but kept working day and night amid the pandemic.

Zhang himself suffers from the amyotrophic lateral sclerosis (ALS), but kept working day and night amid the pandemic.

crowdtangle.post/message: Yang Jiechi, Member of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee/Director of the Office of the Central Commission for Foreign Affairs, met with Spanish Prime Minister Pedro Sánchez. Yang recalled the China-Spain cooperation in fighting #COVID19 and noted that China and Spain must jointly uphold multilateralism, safeguard international equity and justice, and improve global governance. Yang shared his belief that Spain will continue to play a constructive role in advancing China-Europe relations. https://www.fmprc.gov.cn/mfa_eng/zxxx_662805/t1812373.shtml

crowdtangle.post/message: #WorldHeritageinChina No.8: Peking Man Site at Zhoukoudian is a Pleistocene hominid site. Ancient human fossils, cultural remains and animal fossils dating from 5 million years to 10,000 years ago have been discovered, including Homo erectus pekinensis (700K to 200K years ago).

crowdtangle.post/message: China and Russia vowed on Thursday to work together to safeguard the results of the victory in World War II and international fairness and justice, and to jointly uphold global stability and security. 　　President Xi Jinping and Russian President Vladimir Putin made the pledge in an exchange of messages celebrating the 75th anniversary of the victory of the World Anti-Fascist War.

crowdtangle.post/message: #QuotesFromPresidentXi Xi Jinping Leads China's War Against #COVIDー19 (Episode 96)
crowdtangle.post/allText: #QuotesFromPresidentXi Xi Jinping Leads China's War Against #COVIDー19 (Episode 96) @ChineseEmb_Uga Promoting economic recovery and growth against the background of a protracted pandemic and regular epidemic control measures is a major task for all countries, China will continue to deepen reform and raise the level of opening up in an all-round way, so as to establish a new development pattern that allows domestic and foreign markets to boost each other, which will provide broader market opportunities for the world. Chinese President Xi Jinping, Speaking in a Telephone Conversation with Indonesian President Joko Widodo on 31 August, 2020 XI JINPING LEADS CHINA'S WAR AGAINST COVID 19

crowdtangle.post/message: China is capable of navigating its economy amid the COVID19 fallout, and opportunities for the world's largest developing economy are promising in the long run.
crowdtangle.post/allText: China is capable of navigating its economy amid the COVID19 fallout, and opportunities for the world's largest developing economy are promising in the long run. Moody's has raised its growth forecast for Chinese economy this year to 1.9% from 1% earlier, the only country in G20 to have positive growth. Moody's also projected deeper contractions for other countries during 2020.
combined/text: China is capable of navigating its economy amid the COVID19 fallout, and opportunities for the world's largest developing economy are promising in the long run.

crowdtangle.post/message: Vocational education helps Uygur woman into factory management
crowdtangle.post/allText: Vocational education helps Uygur woman into factory management Before taking vocational education and training, Uygur woman Janaqiz Rozi had neither a job nor the skills to get one. After completing her studies at a local vocational education and training center, she's now a mid-level manager at an electronics factory.

crowdtangle.post/message: Notice on Requiring China-bound Passengers in Nigeria to Obtain COVID-19 Negative Certificates within 3 Days Before Boarding 2020/08/27 To ensure the health and safety of international travel and reduce the risk of cross-border spread of the epidemic, in accordance with relevant joint announcement of the Civil Aviation Administration of China, the General Administration of Customs of China and the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of China issued on 20th July 2020, China-bound passengers from Nigeria, including those ultimately bound for China who transfer via Nigeria, are required to obtain COVID-19 negative certificates before boarding. The Embassy of the People’s Republic of China in the Federal Republic of Nigeria would like to notify: Starting from 1st September 2020 (included), all Chinese and foreign China-bound passengers departing from or transferring via Nigeria are required to take nucleic acid tests and present the COVID-19 negative certificates to the Chinese Embassy or Consulate before boarding. The following arrangements are hereby announced: I. All passengers must take nucleic acid tests for COVID-19 within 3(three) days prior to their flight departures in testing institutions designated by the Chinese Embassy or Consulate in Nigeria. To check the list of designated testing institutions, please see attachment; Ⅱ. For Chinese passengers, only those who can present green health codes with an “HS” mark are allowed to board. In this regard, Chinese passengers are required to upload photos of their COVID-19 negative certificates to the Wechat mini program COVID-19 Prevention Health Code International Version through Entry B within 24 hours after obtaining their negative certificates. Those approved by the Chinese Embassy or Consulate will obtain green health codes with an "HS" mark for a certain validity period. Please visit https://hr.cs.mfa.gov.cn/help_two/help-two/hs.html for Q & A. Ⅲ. For foreign passengers, only those who can present valid Health Declaration Forms (see attachment) issued by the Chinese Embassy or Consulate are allowed to board. In this regard, after obtaining their COVID-19 negative certificates, foreign passengers are required to email(email subject: name+date of departure+location of the testing institution) their scanned copies of (1) information page of the valid passports, (2) COVID-19 negative certificates and (3) Health Declaration Forms signed by the applicants to the following designated email addresses of the Chinese Embassy or Consulate, according to the consular districts where the testing institutions are located. After verification, the Embassy or Consulates will return the scanned copy of officially stamped Health Declaration Forms to the passengers by email. All passengers are required to board with 2 hard copies of Health Declaration Forms within its validity period and cooperate with airlines for checking (one copy for the airline). consulate_nga@mfa.gov(for testing institutions in the Consular Districts of the Embassy of China in Nigeria) cnconsulate12308@gmail.com(for testing institutions in the Consular Districts of the Consulate General of China in Lagos) Ⅳ. Airlines are responsible for checking the green health codes with an “HS” mark or Health Declaration Forms of their passengers before boarding. Passengers who fail to meet the above requirements should not be allowed to board the planes and have to rearrange their itinerary. Ⅴ. All Chinese and foreign passengers who transfer via Nigeria to China should complete the nucleic acid tests and applications for the green health codes with an “HS” mark or the Health Declaration Forms in the departure country in advance. Ⅵ. All Chinese and foreign passengers traveling to China via countries or regions in which COVID-19 nucleic acid testing measures are implemented(The list of countries and regions is available at https://hr.cs.mfa.gov.cn/help_two/help-two/gj.html), are also required to produce health codes with "HS" mark or Health Declaration Forms when transiting. Please make sure that the health codes or Forms are still valid when boarding the connecting flights to avoid being stranded. Hard copies of COVID-19 negative certificates are strongly recommended to be kept on hand for further checking. Ⅶ. The uploaded test certificates must be complete, clear and unmodified. Otherwise, it may affect the result of verification. Ⅷ. Passengers who provide false certificates or information shall bear corresponding legal liabilities. Ⅸ. The notice announced on 22nd August 2020 is annulled and this new one shall prevail. The Embassy of the People’s Republic of China in the Federal Republic of Nigeria reserves the right to final interpretation of the above arrangements. Attachment: To download attachement please visit http://ng.chineseembassy.org/eng/zngx/cne/t1809943.htm 1.Health Declaration Form(template) 2.Green Health Codes 3.Consular Districts of the Embassy of China in (truncated)

crowdtangle.post/message: Happy Chinese Valentine's Day.
crowdtangle.post/allText:
Happy Chinese Valentine's Day. The Qixi Festival, a celebration of pure love and family reunion

Regarded as China’s Valentine’s Day, the Qixi Festival falls on the seventh day of the seventh month on the Chinese lunar calendar. Also widely known as Double Seventh Festival, the traditional festival takes place on Aug 25 this year.

Originating from over 2,000 years ago, the festival of love endured for such a long time because of the romantic legend behind the day.

The moving love story goes that Niulang, a cowherd, fell in love with Zhinv, a weaver fairy, and they got married. But later they were separated by the Silver River (the Milky Way), as their love was not allowed by the gods. They could only reunite once a year when a flock of magpies, which were deeply touched by their love, formed a bridge across the river.

This beautiful tale is told every year during the Qixi Festival to commemorate the couple’s eternal love. And for many young people in China, Niulang and Zhinv’s story is also a symbol of their own relationship, as lovers in long-distance relationships or couples that are busy with work have less time to reunite. To celebrate the reunion of Niulang and Zhinv is also a way to express people’s wishes for pure love.

Qixi Festival was added to China’s National Intangible Cultural Heritage List in 2006. (With input from Xinhua and CGTN; Produced by Chen Zilin and Wang Han)
combined/text: Happy Chinese Valentine's Day.

crowdtangle.post/message: China’s home-made 360-ton scaled electric wheel mining vehicle, NTE360A, is going to be exported to the Australian market. With a maximum speed of 64km/h, the 16-meter-long and 10-meter-wide truck could meet the highest mining standards in the world. The mining industry in Botswana has great potential and may need such excellent trucks as well.

crowdtangle.post/message: Ms. Ikanyeng Gaebepe, designer and owner of a Botswana company called Pink dot Material Textile and Design, became our FIRST WINNER of the #AntiCovid19Story campaign and won a latest Huawei pad. We’d like to share her story here: “I felt the need to participate in the fight against COVID 19. As a fashion designer and a director of Pinkdot designs I was compelled to make masks that I contributed nation wide. As a mother I had to make a valuable contribution towards fighting the pandemic. This pandemic first hit China, Wuhan where my son resides as a university student. As a parent I had to join hands with the government and the nation at large to fight the virus. I felt the need to design the masks that joins Botswana flag and China flag to show solidarity and to promote cordial relationship that my country Botswana shares with China and to symbolise a united front as global citizens.” Congratulations to Ms. Gaebepe! We look forward to more such inspiring stories!

crowdtangle.post/message: China's top legislator Li Zhanshu on Wednesday called on legislative bodies to firmly safeguard multilateralism, and promote global anti-epidemic cooperation and economic recovery. Li, chairman of the National People's Congress (NPC) Standing Committee, made the remarks in Beijing via video link at the Fifth World Conference of Speakers of Parliament, under the theme of parliamentary leadership for more effective multilateralism that delivers peace and sustainable development for the people and the planet.
crowdtangle.post/allText: China's top legislator Li Zhanshu on Wednesday called on legislative bodies to firmly safeguard multilateralism, and promote global anti-epidemic cooperation and economic recovery. Li, chairman of the National People's Congress (NPC) Standing Committee, made the remarks in Beijing via video link at the Fifth World Conference of Speakers of Parliament, under the theme of parliamentary leadership for more effective multilateralism that delivers peace and sustainable development for the people and the planet. China's top legislator Li Zhanshu on Wednesday called on joint efforts of legislative bodies to firmly safeguard multilateralism, and promote global anti-epidemic cooperation and economic recovery.

crowdtangle.post/message: এক মিলিয়ন #উইঘুর মুসলিমদের বন্দী শিবিরে আটক করে রাখা হয়েছে? #সিনজিয়াং এ জোর করে জন্মনিয়ন্ত্রণ করানো হচ্ছে? #মুসলিমদের বিরুদ্ধে সাংস্কৃতিক গণহত্যা চালানো হচ্ছে? এ যেন একটি অন্তহীন মিথ্যের তালিকা !!! চলুন আজ সিনজিয়াং ভিত্তিক প্রকৃত গবেষকদের রচিত #গ্লোবাল_টাইমস এ প্রকাশিত নিবন্ধটির মাধ্যমে জেনে নেই জার্মান নাগরিক তথাকথিত সিনজিয়াং "বিশেষজ্ঞ" জনাব অ্যাড্রিয়ান জেনজ এবং সিনজিয়াং এর ভাবমূর্তি বিনষ্ট করার ও চীনের নীতির অপব্যাখ্যার উদ্দেশ্যে কিছু পশ্চিমা গণমাধ্যম ও গবেষণাভিত্তিক প্রতিষ্ঠানের সাথে তাঁর যোগসাজশের কথা। One million #Uygurs detained in concentration camps? Forced birth control in #Xinjiang? Cultural genocide against #Muslims? Just a never-ending list of lies!!! Today let’s get to know Adrian Zenz, a so called German “expert” on Xinjiang, and his collusion with some Western media and think tanks to distort Xinjiang’s image and misinterpret China’s policies through this article published on #GlobalTimes by real researchers based in Xinjiang. ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Xinjiang think tank unveils Adrian Zenz as swindler under academic disguise Editor's Note: A German "scholar" named Adrian Zenz has recently stood out on the anti-China stage. With his "reports" accusing China of "detaining" Uygurs and other minority groups or imposing "sterilization" on ethnic minorities in its Xinjiang region, Zenz has been welcomed by US and Western media as "a leading expert" on Xinjiang. However, Chinese scholars from a Xinjiang-based think tank, Xinjiang Development Research Center, found the so-called expert on Xinjiang is a far-right Christian, who is fabricating unfounded reports to slander China's policies in Xinjiang and cater to the US and some Western countries' aim of attacking China. Zenz's "reports" that have been cited and hyped by some Western media are full of lies, farfetched assumptions, and baseless accusations. Who is Adrian Zenz? Adrian Zenz, an evangelical "scholar," has recently been making so-called reports on Northwest China's Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region, aiming to slander China's policies in the region. Who is Adrian Zenz? What did he do to make the US and Western countries tout him as one of the "leading" experts studying China's Xinjiang and Tibet Autonomous Region? Zenz, born in 1974, is a German. He gives himself a Chinese name as Zheng Guoen. He used to work for the European School of Culture and Theology and went to China's Xinjiang in 2007 as a visitor. Starting in 2016, Zenz began commenting on China's Xinjiang, and wantonly slandering and distorting China's policies in the region. He made up more than 10 reports relating to Xinjiang, including one published in February titled The Karakax List: Dissecting the Anatomy of Beijing's Internment Drive in Xinjiang and another in July titled Sterilizations, IUDs, and Coercive Birth Prevention: The CCP's Campaign to Suppress Uyghur Birth Rates in Xinjiang. He also kept making sensational and unfounded accusations against China, including that around "1 million Uygurs are illegally detained in Xinjiang," "Xinjiang imposes birth control measures on Uygurs and minorities," and "Xinjiang is having culture genocide on minorities." Under the vehement support of the Western media, including The New York Times and The Washington Post, Zenz gained infamy on the anti-China stage and has been welcomed as "an expert on Xinjiang." He has received enthusiastic approval from anti-China politicians from the US and become a focal member of a research group on Xinjiang's vocational training and education center that was set up and controlled by a US intelligence agency. In recent years, Zenz has been busy in shuttling between the US Congress, European Parliament and Canadian Parliament, making groundless accusations against China's Xinjiang policies to incite attacks and pressure on China by using the so-called "human rights problems of Uygurs." In March, together with many US politicians and members of the "East Turkistan" separatists, Zenz attended an event themed "China's Systematic Persecution of Uygurs" at the United States (truncated)

crowdtangle.post/message: During a video Dialogue with Members of US Congress, Vice Foreign Minister Zheng Zeguang stressed, China and the US must always manage differences in a constructive manner, abide by the principles and spirit of the three China-US Joint Communiqués, and respect each other's core interests and major concerns. Under the current circumstances, people of insight from all walks of life should, in a spirit of being responsible of history and people, take active and collective actions to firmly stop a few US politicians from crazily sabotaging China-US relations out of their selfish interests and steadfastly safeguard the foundation of bilateral relations and the common interests of both peoples. It is hoped that the Congress members will play a constructive role in safeguarding China-US relations. Ami Bera and other Congress members said, US-China relations are of critical significance to both countries and the world. Both sides should make concerted efforts to maintain the stable development of US-China relations, which is in conformity with the interests of the two peoples and peoples of the world. Though the US and China have different values, political systems and differences on many issues, both countries should enhance mutual understanding through candid dialogues and communication, effectively manage differences and work to expand mutually beneficial cooperation in areas including anti-epidemic, economy and trade. The US Congress is willing to continue its communication and exchanges with the Chinese side, and looks forward to more dialogues of this kind. Full text: https://www.fmprc.gov.cn/mfa_eng/wjbxw/t1807078.shtml
crowdtangle.post/allText: During a video Dialogue with Members of US Congress, Vice Foreign Minister Zheng Zeguang stressed, China and the US must always manage differences in a constructive manner, abide by the principles and spirit of the three China-US Joint Communiqués, and respect each other's core interests and major concerns. Under the current circumstances, people of insight from all walks of life should, in a spirit of being responsible of history and people, take active and collective actions to firmly stop a few US politicians from crazily sabotaging China-US relations out of their selfish interests and steadfastly safeguard the foundation of bilateral relations and the common interests of both peoples. It is hoped that the Congress members will play a constructive role in safeguarding China-US relations. Ami Bera and other Congress members said, US-China relations are of critical significance to both countries and the world. Both sides should make concerted efforts to maintain the stable development of US-China relations, which is in conformity with the interests of the two peoples and peoples of the world. Though the US and China have different values, political systems and differences on many issues, both countries should enhance mutual understanding through candid dialogues and communication, effectively manage differences and work to expand mutually beneficial cooperation in areas including anti-epidemic, economy and trade. The US Congress is willing to continue its communication and exchanges with the Chinese side, and looks forward to more dialogues of this kind. Full text: https://www.fmprc.gov.cn/mfa_eng/wjbxw/t1807078.shtml
combined/text: During a video Dialogue with Members of US Congress, Vice Foreign Minister Zheng Zeguang stressed, China and the US must always manage differences in a constructive manner, abide by the principles and spirit of the three China-US Joint Communiqués, and respect each other's core interests and major concerns. Under the current circumstances, people of insight from all walks of life should, in a spirit of being responsible of history and people, take active and collective actions to firmly stop a few US politicians from crazily sabotaging China-US relations out of their selfish interests and steadfastly safeguard the foundation of bilateral relations and the common interests of both peoples. It is hoped that the Congress members will play a constructive role in safeguarding China-US relations. Ami Bera and other Congress members said, US-China relations are of critical significance to both countries and the world. Both sides should make concerted efforts to maintain the stable development of US-China relations, which is in conformity with the interests of the two peoples and peoples of the world. Though the US and China have different values, political systems and differences on many issues, both countries should enhance mutual understanding through candid dialogues and communication, effectively manage differences and work to expand mutually beneficial cooperation in areas including anti-epidemic, economy and trade. The US Congress is willing to continue its communication and exchanges with the Chinese side, and looks forward to more dialogues of this kind. Full text: https://www.fmprc.gov.cn/mfa_eng/wjbxw/t1807078.shtml

crowdtangle.post/message: Chinese State Councilor and Foreign Minister Wang Yi had an exclusive interview with Xinhua News Agency on 5 August. Wang said the assertion that US policy of engagement with China has failed is just a rehash of the Cold War mentality. It turns a blind eye to all that has been achieved in China-US relations over the past decades, shows ignorance of the historical process and lack of respect for the Chinese and American peoples. This is a political virus which is understandably questioned and rebuked by people in the United States and the international community. https://www.fmprc.gov.cn/mfa_eng/zxxx_662805/t1804328.shtml 8月5日，中国国务委员兼外交部长王毅接受新华社专访。 王毅针对美国国务卿蓬佩奥称美历届政府对华接触政策失败阐述中方立场。 王毅表示，所谓“美国对华接触政策失败”的论调重拾冷战思维，完全否定了中美交往几十年来取得的成果，不仅是对历史进程的无知，也是对中美两国人民的不尊重。这种散布“政治病毒”的做法理所当然会受到美国国内以及国际社会的质疑和批评。 https://www.fmprc.gov.cn/web/wjbzhd/t1804247.shtml

crowdtangle.post/message: Foreign Ministry Spokesperson Wang Wenbin's Regular Press Conference on July 29, 2020 2020/07/29 The Paper: US Secretary of State Pompeo said in his speech at the Richard Nixon Presidential Library that “the old paradigm of blind engagement with China” failed, and this kind of engagement has not brought the kind of change inside of China that the US had hoped to induce. What is your comment on his remarks? Wang Wenbin: Pompeo and some other US politicians have been hyping up so-called “failed US engagement with China” and “failed US attempt to induce change inside of China”. In response to their comments, the Chinese side has made clear its position, and I’d like to stress the following points. First, the claim of “failed US engagement with China” disrespects history and facts. Over the past nearly five decades since China and the US resumed exchange and established diplomatic relations, the two sides have been expanding and deepening exchange and cooperation across the board, which greatly benefited people in both countries. According to statistics, China-US economic and trade relations support 2.6 million American jobs, and over 72,500 US companies have investments or business in China. In multilateral fora, China-US cooperation has benefited the two countries and the world, from handling regional hotspots to addressing global issues like counter-terrorism and non-proliferation. Second, the “US attempt to induce change inside of China” is doomed to fail. The path a country takes should be determined by its own people based on its cultural tradition and historical heritage. No force is entitled to negate the choice of other countries. In a world full of diversity, China and the US, despite their different social systems, can by all means peacefully co-exist. Third, driven by political needs, Pompeo and some others are negating previous US administrations’ China policy and the progress achieved in relations with China and attempting to stoke ideological confrontation. This has proven to be unpopular even in the US. Over the past few days, many former politicians, academics and media have questioned and criticized his remarks, pointing out his misconceptions on China, China-US relations and the US China policy objectives. This fact itself speaks volumes. I must stress that China-US relations bear on the well-being of the two peoples and world peace and stability. We urge the likes of Pompeo to renounce the obsolete Cold War mentality and ideological bias, look at China and China-US relations correctly, and immediately stop words and acts damaging Chinese interests and bilateral relations so as to create conditions for bringing this relationship back on track.

crowdtangle.post/message: #ProsperTogether With an annual production of 274,000 tons of oysters, Qinzhou of Guangxi Zhuang autonomous region is known as the largest oyster breeding base in South China. The industry yielded over 3 billion yuan last year. In the city's core breeding demonstration zone, 800 households joined the industry and each now earns an average of 300,000 yuan yearly. The business has also caused a boom in local tourism and created 2000 job opportunities.

crowdtangle.post/message: The BeiDou-3 Satellite Navigation System is not only of China but also for the world; it serves China as well as the whole world. After its completion, it will provide services including basic navigation, global short message communications, worldwide search and rescue, etc. This system now covers over 200 countries and regions, serves more than 100 million users and provides 200 million services daily. Over half of all countries in the world are using this system now.

crowdtangle.post/message: PLA at 93: a Force for Peace By Hua Ning, Chinese Ambassador On August 1, 1927, the Chinese People’s Liberation Army (PLA) was founded in a heroic city, Nanchang. Since then, it has gone through a glorious course of 93 years. ——The PLA is the people’s army that has steadfastly upheld the absolute leadership of the Communist Party of China (CPC). Over the past 93 years, under the strong leadership of CPC, the PLA has shown great courage and fearlessness in fighting for the independence of the Chinese nation, liberation of the people and founding of the People’s Republic of China. It has made remarkable contribution to safeguarding national sovereignty, security and development interests.The PLA has always been a strong force to defend China’s development and social stability, providing effective safeguard for pursuing the two centenary goals and the Chinese dream of national rejuvenation. It well deserves the name of the “Great Wall of steel”. ——The PLA is the people’s army that has always maintained flesh-and-blood ties with the people. Deeply rooted in the Chinese people, the PLA is from the people, by the people, and for the people. Either in the years of revolutionary wars or in the new journey of social economic development, reform and opening up, the PLA has firmly adhered to the fundamental goal of serving the Chinese people wholeheartedly, always stood closely with the people. Whenever it is in need, the PLA always provides support in the shortest time. After the COVID-19 outbreak in China early this year, the PLA rapidly deployed over 10,000 military medical personnel to combat the virus; in the face of recent severe floods that hit China, tens of thousands of PLA troops are fighting on the front lines to protect people’s lives and properties. ——The PLA is the people’s army that has always been committed to safeguarding world peace and stability. Following the vision of building a community with a shared future for mankind, the PLA has faithfully honored its international responsibilities and obligations, played important roles in the the UN peacekeeping operations, on escort missions in the Gulf of Aden, and in international humanitarian relief operations. During the globe pandemic of COVID 19, the PLA has dispatched medical expert teams to the most severely hit countries, provided medical material assistance to many foreign armies, contributing to the global solidarity against the pandemic. This year also marks the 30th anniversary of China’s participation in UN peacekeeping operations. China is now the largest troop contributing country among the five permanent members of the UN Security Council, and the main funding contributor to the UN peacekeeping operations. So far, China has dispatched over 40,000 troops to 25 UN peacekeeping missions with 15 soldiers sacrificed their lives while on duty. At present, more than 1,000 Chinese peacekeepers are deployed in UN mission in South Sudan. They help South Sudanese people build roads and bridges, maintain law and order, provide medical services to the locals and actively participate in social welfare activities. The Chinese peacekeepers has won the trust of all sides for their dedication, discipline and professionalism. In the past hundred of years, China had also experienced turmoils and sufferings, so we deeply empathize with the suffer of the South Sudanese people. Over the years, China has been constructively participating in the peace process of South Sudan. China supports the mediation efforts of IGAD and the African Union to promote peace in South Sudan. We have provided in-kind aids to support South Sudanese side to implement the R-ARCSS, especially for the process of unification of force; we have continuously carried out humanitarian assistance to support South Sudan’s economic and social development. Peace is the foundation of development, while development is the guarantee for peace. We sincerely congratulate the important progress made in South Sudan’s peace process and hope all the parties concerned will continue to unite and push forward the momentum of peace for the interests of South Sudanese people and nation’s future; and to greet the second decade of South Sudan’s independence with a new look. As early as two thousand years ago, the Chinese recognized that “though a country is now strong, bellicosity will lead to its ruin”. The Chinese nation has always loved peace. Since the founding of People’s Republic of China, it has never started any war or conflict. China has voluntarily downsized the PLA by more than 4 million troops since 1980. The development of China’s national defense aims to meet its rightful security needs and contribute to the growth of the world’s peaceful forces. China will never follow the beaten track of big powers in seeking hegemony; on the contrary, China advocates that the world’s major powers should avoid falling into the self-fulfilled (truncated)

It well deserves the name of the “Great Wall of steel”. ——The PLA is the people’s army that has always maintained flesh-and-blood ties with the people. Deeply rooted in the Chinese people, the PLA is from the people, by the people, and for the people. Either in the years of revolutionary wars or in the new journey of social economic development, reform and opening up, the PLA has firmly adhered to the fundamental goal of serving the Chinese people wholeheartedly, always stood closely with the people. Whenever it is in need, the PLA always provides support in the shortest time. After the COVID-19 outbreak in China early this year, the PLA rapidly deployed over 10,000 military medical personnel to combat the virus; in the face of recent severe floods that hit China, tens of thousands of PLA troops are fighting on the front lines to protect people’s lives and properties. ——The PLA is the people’s army that has always been committed to safeguarding world peace and stability. Following the vision of building a community with a shared future for mankind, the PLA has faithfully honored its international responsibilities and obligations, played important roles in the the UN peacekeeping operations, on escort missions in the Gulf of Aden, and in international humanitarian relief operations. During the globe pandemic of COVID 19, the PLA has dispatched medical expert teams to the most severely hit countries, provided medical material assistance to many foreign armies, contributing to the global solidarity against the pandemic. This year also marks the 30th anniversary of China’s participation in UN peacekeeping operations. China is now the largest troop contributing country among the five permanent members of the UN Security Council, and the main funding contributor to the UN peacekeeping operations. So far, China has dispatched over 40,000 troops to 25 UN peacekeeping missions with 15 soldiers sacrificed their lives while on duty. At present, more than 1,000 Chinese peacekeepers are deployed in UN mission in South Sudan. They help South Sudanese people build roads and bridges, maintain law and order, provide medical services to the locals and actively participate in social welfare activities. The Chinese peacekeepers has won the trust of all sides for their dedication, discipline and professionalism. In the past hundred of years, China had also experienced turmoils and sufferings, so we deeply empathize with the suffer of the South Sudanese people. Over the years, China has been constructively participating in the peace process of South Sudan. China supports the mediation efforts of IGAD and the African Union to promote peace in South Sudan. We have provided in-kind aids to support South Sudanese side to implement the R-ARCSS, especially for the process of unification of force; we have continuously carried out humanitarian assistance to support South Sudan’s economic and social development. Peace is the foundation of development, while development is the guarantee for peace. We sincerely congratulate the important progress made in South Sudan’s peace process and hope all the parties concerned will continue to unite and push forward the momentum of peace for the interests of South Sudanese people and nation’s future; and to greet the second decade of South Sudan’s independence with a new look. As early as two thousand years ago, the Chinese recognized that “though a country is now strong, bellicosity will lead to its ruin”. The Chinese nation has always loved peace. Since the founding of People’s Republic of China, it has never started any war or conflict. China has voluntarily downsized the PLA by more than 4 million troops since 1980. The development of China’s national defense aims to meet its rightful security needs and contribute to the growth of the world’s peaceful forces. China will never follow the beaten track of big powers in seeking hegemony; on the contrary, China advocates that the world’s major powers should avoid falling into the self-fulfilled (truncated) The 93rd Anniversary of the Founding of the Chinese People's Liberation Army (1927-2020)

Over the past 93 years, under the strong leadership of CPC, the PLA has shown great courage and fearlessness in fighting for the independence of the Chinese nation, liberation of the people and founding of the People’s Republic of China. It has made remarkable contribution to safeguarding national sovereignty, security and development interests.The PLA has always been a strong force to defend China’s development and social stability, providing effective safeguard for pursuing the two centenary goals and the Chinese dream of national rejuvenation. During the globe pandemic of COVID 19, the PLA has dispatched medical expert teams to the most severely hit countries, provided medical material assistance to many foreign armies, contributing to the global solidarity against the pandemic. This year also marks the 30th anniversary of China’s participation in UN peacekeeping operations. China is now the largest troop contributing country among the five permanent members of the UN Security Council, and the main funding contributor to the UN peacekeeping operations. So far, China has dispatched over 40,000 troops to 25 UN peacekeeping missions with 15 soldiers sacrificed their lives while on duty. At present, more than 1,000 Chinese peacekeepers are deployed in UN mission in South Sudan. They help South Sudanese people build roads and bridges, maintain law and order, provide medical services to the locals and actively participate in social welfare activities. The Chinese peacekeepers has won the trust of all sides for their dedication, discipline and professionalism. Over the years, China has been constructively participating in the peace process of South Sudan. China supports the mediation efforts of IGAD and the African Union to promote peace in South Sudan. We have provided in-kind aids to support South Sudanese side to implement the R-ARCSS, especially for the process of unification of force; we have continuously carried out humanitarian assistance to support South Sudan’s economic and social development. Peace is the foundation of development, while development is the guarantee for peace. We sincerely congratulate the important progress made in South Sudan’s peace process and hope all the parties concerned will continue to unite and push forward the momentum of peace for the interests of South Sudanese people and nation’s future; and to greet the second decade of South Sudan’s independence with a new look. As early as two thousand years ago, the Chinese recognized that “though a country is now strong, bellicosity will lead to its ruin”. The Chinese nation has always loved peace. crowdtangle.post/message: The Embassy of the People’s Republic of China in Barbados expresses the deepest condolences on the passing of Professor the Right Honourable Owen Seymour Arthur, former Prime Minister of Barbados and extends the sincerest sympathy to Professor Arthur’s family and friends. We pay tribute to Professor Arthur’s distinguished contributions to the economic and social development of Barbados, as well as to the peace, stability and prosperity of the Caribbean region. We commend Professor Arthur’s holding positive and comprehensive perspectives on China’s development and making important contributions to advancing the development of China-Barbados relationship, facilitating practical cooperation between the two countries in various fields and enhancing friendship between the two peoples. May Professor Arthur rest in peace.

May Professor Arthur rest in peace.

crowdtangle.post/message: China's Foreign Ministry Telling US to Close its Consulate General in Chengdu On the morning of 24 July, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of China informed the US Embassy in China of its decision to withdraw its consent for the establishment and operation of the US Consulate General in Chengdu. The Ministry also made specific requirements on the ceasing of all operations and events by the Consulate General. On 21 July, the US launched a unilateral provocation by abruptly demanding that China close its Consulate General in Houston. The US move seriously breached international law, the basic norms of international relations, and the terms of the China-US Consular Convention. It gravely harmed China-US relations. The measure taken by China is a legitimate and necessary response to the unjustified act by the US. It conforms with international law, the basic norms of international relations, and customary diplomatic practices. The current situation in China-US relations is not what China desires to see, and the US is responsible for all this. We once again urge the US to immediately retract its wrong decision and create necessary conditions for bringing the bilateral relationship back on track.

crowdtangle.post/message: The Chinese Embassy in Libya on Jul 17 handed over a batch of medical supplies to the Libyan Embassy in Tunisia to help the northern African country fight the COVID-19 pandemic, the Chinese embassy said in a statement. The donation is one of the most recent fruits of the friendship between China and Africa, which came after the first lady of the Republic of the Congo Antoinette Sassou N'guesso exchanged letters earlier this month with Peng Liyuan, wife of Chinese President Xi Jinping. http://www.xinhuanet.com/english/2020-07/18/c_139221978.htm

crowdtangle.post/message: 28/37 What's False and What's True on China-related Human Rights Matters False: The Chinese government forces sterilization, abortion and birth control on Uyghurs and other ethnic minorities in Xinjiang. True: ◆The Chinese government protects the lawful rights and interests of all Chinese without distinction of ethnicity. Over the years, the Uyghur people and other ethnic minorities have enjoyed a preferential population policy. In the four decades between 1978 and 2018, the Uyghur population in Xinjiang increased from 5.55 million to 11.68 million, accounting for 46.8% of the total population of the autonomous region. ◆To put things into perspective, let's look at the situation in the United States. Racial and ethnic minorities in the US have long been the targets of bullying, exclusion, and widespread and systemic discrimination in the political, economic, cultural and social aspects of their lives. Take Native Americans as an example. For quite a long period of time, the US government had been enforcing a policy of genocide, segregation and assimilation against Native Americans. For nearly a century after its founding, the US was uprooting and killing American Indians in its Westward Movement. The Native American population plunged from 5 million in 1492 to 0.25 million in the early 20th century. It now accounts for a mere 2 percent of the US population. Another example, African Americans. African Americans have a COVID-19 infection rate five times that of white Americans, and a much higher mortality rate as well. This highlights the racial inequality in the US. The recent death of an African American George Floyd and the massive protests that followed once again shows that the systemic racial discrimination in the US has reached a point where racial and ethnic minorities "can't breathe". It calls for an urgent solution.

crowdtangle.post/message: Spokesperson of the Chinese Embassy in Myanmar Refutes the False Argument by the Chargé d'Affaires of the U.S. Embassy in Myanmar On July 18, Mr. George Sibley, the Chargé d’Affaires of the U.S. Embassy in Myanmar, published an article. He tried his best to draw forced analogies, speak on hearsay evidence, confuse right with wrong, to attack and smear China, deliberately driving a wedge between China-Myanmar cooperation and bilateral relations. The spokesperson of the Chinese Embassy in Myanmar makes a statement exposing and refuting the U.S. side's selfish, hypocritical, contemptible and ugly face. The spokesperson points out that for a period of time, the U.S. has been pursuing the so-called America First Policy. It ignores international ethics and legal norms, disregards the common interests of mankind and international trends, and has done a lot of disgusting things. In order to contain China, U.S. agencies abroad are ordered to attack and smear China. Now the U.S. Embassy in Myanmar has also extended a dirty hand to the Chinese side. The article of the U.S. Embassy is full of dirty loopholes and shoddy work to the extent that is shocking. With extremely unreasonable logic, the article links Myanmar with Hong Kong and the South China Sea issues, and even with the democracy and sovereignty issues flaunted by the United States in order to defame China-Myanmar relations, bilateral cooperation and anti-pandemic assistance. This only suggests that the U.S. agencies abroad have done whatever they could think of to attack China. Under the current international situation, the reasons why the article outrageously smearing China and sowing discords between China and Myanmar are thought-provoking. This not only reflects the "sour grapes" mindset of the United States towards the flourishing China-Myanmar relations but also another farce on a global tour by the U.S. authorities to shift the attention on domestic problems and seek selfish political gains. Know your own faults before blaming others for theirs. The U.S. should first look in the mirror to see whether it still looks like a major country now. The U.S. has overstepped the bottom line of international relations, promotes egoism, unilateralism and bullying, ignores international rules and international moral responsibilities, frantically withdraws from important international organizations, undermines international cooperation, refuses to perform major country’s responsibilities, and endangers international peace and security. The U.S. has overstepped the bottom line of regional cooperation by downgrading the level of delegates attending the ASEAN summits for consecutive years, paying lip service in the cooperation with ASEAN and Myanmar, constantly playing up the South China Sea issue and disrupting the regional peace and stability. The U.S. has overstepped the bottom line in domestic governance. Based on "Political Self-interest First" and "Vote First", the U.S. has missed the pandemic prevention and control window period time and time again, causing the number of daily infections to continuously strike new highs. The U.S. did not introspect itself. Instead, it has been shifting the blame frantically to China globally, in an attempt to deflect domestic attention and justify its negligence and dereliction of duty. In U.S., racial discrimination, the gap between the rich and the poor, political disunity and other social problems have become prominent, none of which has been seriously resolved. As the Chinese idiom goes, covering one’s ears whilst stealing a bell. How could U.S. expect to cover up its own scars by slandering and discrediting China? The U.S. has regained the notorious “McCarthyist bigotry” and outdated “Cold War mindset” on its current China policy, and deliberately stoked ideological oppositions, breaking through the baseline of international law and basic norms of international relations. China will never be driven by a few American anti-China forces, and will firmly defend its legitimate interests and dignity. Hong Kong is China's territory. It is entirely China's internal affairs for the Chinese government to plug the loopholes in national security and issue the Law on Safeguarding National Security in the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region (HKSAR). In order to continue to use Hong Kong to engage in anti-China actions, the U.S. repeatedly and maliciously slanders and discredits the Law on Safeguarding National Security in the HKSAR, and even insists on signing the so-called Hong Kong Autonomy Bill into law. This is a blatant interference in China's internal affairs and a blasphemy against the common will of the 1.4 billion Chinese people, including Hong Kong compatriots. Hong Kong is China's Hong Kong, and the U.S. has no right to make irresponsible remarks. On the South China Sea issue, the U.S. breaks its public commitment of not taking a position on the South China Sea sovereignty issue. The U.S., out (truncated)

crowdtangle.post/message: China's GDP expanded 3.2% year on year in the second quarter of 2020, standing at $6.53 trillion. China's economy bounces back to growth as it gradually resumes work and production after effectively containing #COVID19.

crowdtangle.post/message: China's latest response to the US's maliciously attacks on the Chinese Government's Xinjiang policy Facts speak louder than words. During the past four decades, Uyghur population in Xinjiang more than doubled from 5.55 million to 11.68 million. There is one mosque for every 530 Muslims in Xinjiang, and the total number of mosques is 10 times more than that in the US. People of all ethnic groups in Xinjiang lead happy lives. They can breathe freely. Has the US side ever seen such "ethnic repression"? The US also falsely claims that Muslims in Xinjiang live under close surveillance and that more than one million CPC cadres live in Uyghur homes. The truth is, a "Pair Up and Become Family" program has been carried out in Xinjiang, bringing officials to communities to help people address difficulties in employment, education and medical services. In over three years, more than 987 million yuan and 51.12 million articles have been donated and 18.77 million cases that bear on local people's immediate interests and welfare have been properly tended to. The program has been warmly received by people of various ethnic groups. It is a concrete example showing the deep bond between the CPC and the Chinese people and the Chinese government putting people first with its down-to-earth approach. The US politicians who don't care for people's welfare and only care about their own political gains surely cannot understand this. Let's look at the situation in the United States. Racial and ethnic minorities in the US have long been the targets of bullying, exclusion, and widespread and systemic discrimination in the political, economic, cultural and social aspects of their lives. Take Native Americans as an example. For quite a long period of time, the US government had been enforcing a policy of genocide, segregation and assimilation against Native Americans. For nearly a century after its founding, the US was uprooting and killing American Indians in its Westward Movement. The Native American population plunged from 5 million to 0.25 million in the early 20th century. It now accounts for a mere 2 percent of the US population. Another example, African Americans. African Americans have a COVID-19 infection rate five times that of white Americans, and a much higher mortality rate as well. This highlights the racial inequality in the US. The recent death of an African American George Floyd and the massive protests that followed once again shows that the systemic racial discrimination in the US has reached a point where racial and ethnic minorities "can't breathe". This is truly heartbreaking.

crowdtangle.post/message: Mr. Wang Bangfu, Deputy Head of the Chinese Embassy met with Mr. Michael Moleleke, Director of International Linkages and Partnership Department in #BIUST via video link yesterday. The two sides exchanged views on tertiary education and scientific innovation, and agreed to further explore practical cooperation to contribute to the anti-pandemic response and economic recovery in Botswana.

crowdtangle.post/message: The National Science Foundation (NSF) recently awarded Dr. Xiong Gong, a professor of polymer engineering, an additional $8,000 for his solar energy cell project, “Bulk Heterojunction Perovskite Solar Cells by Novel Hybrid Perovskite Materials.”
crowdtangle.post/allText: The National Science Foundation (NSF) recently awarded Dr. Xiong Gong, a professor of polymer engineering, an additional $8,000 for his solar energy cell project, “Bulk Heterojunction Perovskite Solar Cells by Novel Hybrid Perovskite Materials.” Dr. Xiong Gong (left) instructs Abigail Wilhite, a then-Research Experience for Undergraduates student at UA, to measure the electrical conductivity of polymeric thin films.
combined/text: The National Science Foundation (NSF) recently awarded Dr. Xiong Gong, a professor of polymer engineering, an additional $8,000 for his solar energy cell project, “Bulk Heterojunction Perovskite Solar Cells by Novel Hybrid Perovskite Materials.”

crowdtangle.post/message: In this month, Shanghai is marking one year since it began an ambitious environmental campaign aimed at reducing, reusing and recycling wastes. As China's commercial capital over the past two decades, the population of the metropolis – and their spending power – grew dramatically. The knock-on effect was a massive waste management problem and, in the end, the authorities said they just couldn't cope unless they changed to a greener strategy. Now it's hoped other cities across China can follow the lead. #GreenChina

The knock-on effect was a massive waste management problem and, in the end, the authorities said they just couldn't cope unless they changed to a greener strategy. Now it's hoped other cities across China can follow the lead. #GreenChina
combined/text: In this month, Shanghai is marking one year since it began an ambitious environmental campaign aimed at reducing, reusing and recycling wastes. As China's commercial capital over the past two decades, the population of the metropolis – and their spending power – grew dramatically. The knock-on effect was a massive waste management problem and, in the end, the authorities said they just couldn't cope unless they changed to a greener strategy. Now it's hoped other cities across China can follow the lead. #GreenChina

crowdtangle.post/message: What’s False and What’s True on China-related Human Rights Matters 1. False: The legislation on safeguarding national security in Hong Kong will undermine the human rights and basic freedoms of Hong Kong residents, and violates the International Covenant on Civil and Political Rights. True: ◆The Law of the People’s Republic of China on Safeguarding National Security in the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region clearly stipulates that human rights shall be respected and protected in safeguarding national security in the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region. The rights and freedoms, including the freedoms of speech, of the press, of publication, of association, of assembly, of procession and of demonstration, which the residents of the Region enjoy under the Basic Law of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region and the provisions of the International Covenant on Civil and Political Rights and the International Covenant on Economic, Social and Cultural Rights as applied to Hong Kong, shall be protected in accordance with the law. ◆The legislation only targets four types of offences, namely, secession, subversion, terrorist activities and collusion with a foreign country or with external elements to endanger national security. It is designed to deter and sanction a small minority in Hong Kong who are involved in offences seriously jeopardizing national security. It aims to protect the great majority of law-abiding Hong Kong residents, and safeguard their safety and lawful rights and freedoms. ◆It is spelt out in the constitutions of over 100 countries that the exercise of basic rights and freedoms shall not endanger national security. The International Covenant on Civil and Political Rights makes it clear that freedoms of religious belief, expression and peaceful assembly, the right to public trial and other rights may be subject to restrictions that are necessary to protect national security, public order and so on. There are similar provisions in the European Convention on Human Rights. 2. False: The legislation on safeguarding national security in Hong Kong may include vaguely defined offences, and be abused by China’s national security authorities to oppress the people. True: ◆The legislation only targets four types of offences that seriously jeopardize national security, much less than the dozens of crimes involving national security listed in countries such as the US and the UK. The legislation sets clear limits on related law enforcement activities. It requires that all law enforcement efforts be conducted in strict accordance with legal provisions and statutory mandates and procedures, without prejudice to the lawful rights and interests of any individual or organization. It also provides that the Office for Safeguarding National Security of the Central People’s Government in the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region shall perform its mandate in strict compliance with the law and be subject to supervision in accordance with the law. The staff of the Office shall abide by the laws of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region as well as national laws. ◆Countries such as the US, the UK, Canada, and Australia have all established rigorous legal frameworks for safeguarding national security, which shows no mercy in combating offences endangering national security.

crowdtangle.post/message: Xinjiang-related issues are not about human rights, ethnicity or religion as some forces claim, but about countering violence, terrorism and separatism. Faced with severe challenges of violence and terrorism, the Chinese government took a series of anti-terrorism and deradicalization measures in Xinjiang to combat these activities and prevent their recurrence, which address both the symptoms and their root causes. Those measures, in compliance with Chinese laws, are China's concrete and effective steps in implementing international initiatives on counter-terrorism and deradicalization. Thanks to them, Xinjiang hasn't seen a single terror incident over the past three years and more, and people's rights to life, health and development have been effectively safeguarded. It is universally acknowledged by the international community that China has contributed to the global human rights cause and counter-terrorism efforts. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S2yWUopabvE&t=423s

crowdtangle.post/message: When “aerial filming” combines with “urban night scene”, what sparks will fly? #UrbanNightSceneInChina post will bring your eyes a great feast with glittering scenes under the moonlight. #EleventhEpisode: #Harbin, the "Ice City", is the capital of Heilongjiang Province and the political, economic and cultural center in Northeast China. It is known as the Pearl of the Eurasian Continental Bridge and the important hub of the first Eurasian Continental Bridge and the air corridor. The beautiful Songhua River passes through the city. Its special geographical location and historical development make it an exotic city with an exotic atmosphere. No wonder people call the "Oriental Moscow" or "Oriental Paris". Which city in China leaves you the deepest impression on its spectacular night scene? Leave your comments below to share with us your feelings.

crowdtangle.post/message: When “aerial filming” combines with “urban night scene”, what sparks will fly? #UrbanNightSceneInChina post will bring your eyes a great feast with glittering scenes under the moonlight. #TenthEpisode: #Tianjin flourishes due to water transportation. It is located at the confluence of the five major tributaries of the Haihe River in the North China Plain. It faces the Bohai Sea in the east and Yanshan Mountain in the north with Haihe River winding through the city. Tianjin is a comprehensive industrial base and business center in China. As the forefront of opening up in northern China and the center of Chinese Westernization Movement, Tianjin’s unique urban scene combines Chinese and Western styles. Which city in China leaves you the deepest impression on its spectacular night scene? Leave your comments below to share with us your feelings.

crowdtangle.post/message: Zongzi, (Sticky rice dumplings) is served on Dragon Boat Festival.
crowdtangle.post/allText:
Zongzi, (Sticky rice dumplings) is served on Dragon Boat Festival. Live: Learn to wrap Zongzi, the colorful way!

The annual Dragon Boat Festival is here – time for Chinese people to eat Zongzi, a glutinous-rice dumpling that can be either salty or sweet. To celebrate the holiday, Jiaxing, a city in east China's Zhejiang Province, is hosting a series of activities, including a Zongzi wrapping contest for overseas guests. Join CGTN's Xu Mengqi at the contest as she shows how the traditional Chinese delicacy is made.
#DragonBoatFestival
combined/text: Zongzi, (Sticky rice dumplings) is served on Dragon Boat Festival.

crowdtangle.post/message: Testing is the key to virus control. To date, more than 90 million nucleic acid tests for #COVID19 have been conducted across China, with testing capacity for the virus increasing significantly. The number of certified medical institutions providing nucleic acid testing for COVID-19 in China has increased from 2,081 in early March to 4,804. These institutions, including hospitals and clinics, can now process 3.8 million samples daily, which has been seen as a key reason for the containment of the epidemic in China. (Picture: Xinhua)

To date, more than 90 million nucleic acid tests for #COVID19 have been conducted across China, with testing capacity for the virus increasing significantly. The number of certified medical institutions providing nucleic acid testing for COVID-19 in China has increased from 2,081 in early March to 4,804. These institutions, including hospitals and clinics, can now process 3.8 million samples daily, which has been seen as a key reason for the containment of the epidemic in China. (Picture: Xinhua)
combined/text: Testing is the key to virus control. To date, more than 90 million nucleic acid tests for #COVID19 have been conducted across China, with testing capacity for the virus increasing significantly. The number of certified medical institutions providing nucleic acid testing for COVID-19 in China has increased from 2,081 in early March to 4,804. These institutions, including hospitals and clinics, can now process 3.8 million samples daily, which has been seen as a key reason for the containment of the epidemic in China. (Picture: Xinhua)

crowdtangle.post/message: “Summer Solstice” [夏至, xià zhì ]comes on June 21 this year when the sun altitude arrive the highest in north. Although, this day has the longest daylight, it’s not the hottest. In some provinces, there is the tradition of eating cold noodles on this day. According to old customs in Beijing, when it comes to “Summer Solstice”, people can eat cold noodles to stimulate the appetite and at the same time don’t need to worry about having diarrhea. #EasyChinese

crowdtangle.post/message: A people united shall never be defeated! That chant which echoed in June 1976 continues to ring across South Africa today as this great nation celebrates its future, the Youth. The challenges are different but just as the Youth stood up and defeated the ruthless system of apartheid, the brave youth of 2020 are also standing up against the Covid-19 pandemic. Just as the People's Republic of China held hands with the freedom fighters back then, today we hold hands even firmer in the fight against the invisible enemy Covid-19. #YouthDay2020

crowdtangle.post/message: “王使人瞷夫子，果有以异于人乎？” 孟子曰：“何以异于人哉？尧舜与人同耳。” -《孟子》 ‘The king sent persons to spy out whether you were really different from other men.’ Mencius said, ‘How should I be different from other men? Yao and Shun were just the same as other men.’ - Mencius
