crowdtangle.post/message: ＃疫情通报 ＃新型冠状病毒肺炎 2月20日0—24时，31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告新增确诊病例889例，新增死亡病例118例（湖北115例，浙江、重庆、云南各1例），新增疑似病例1614例。 当日新增治愈出院病例2109例，解除医学观察的密切接触者28804人，重症病例减少231例。 截至2月20日24时，据31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告，现有确诊病例54965例（其中重症病例11633例），累计治愈出院病例18264例，累计死亡病例2236例，累计报告确诊病例75465例，现有疑似病例5206例。累计追踪到密切接触者606037人，尚在医学观察的密切接触者120302人。 #Notification #CoronaVirus On February 20, 31 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities) and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps reported 889 newly confirmed cases, 118 new deaths (115 in Hubei, each 1 in Zhejiang, Chongqing and Yunnan), and 1,614 new cases were suspected. 2,109 new cases were cured and discharged. 28,804 people were released from medical observation. 231 severe cases decreased. As of 24:00 on February 20, there were 54,965 confirmed cases (among which 11,633 severe cases), 18,264 people had been discharged from hospital after recovery, 2,236 cases of death and 5,206 suspected cases. The National Health and Health Commission had received a total of 75,465 confirmed cases. 606,037 close contacts had been tracked. 120,302 people were receiving medical observation.

crowdtangle.post/message: 16 Successive Days of Reduction! On Feb 19, China’s mainland received 394 report of new confirmed cases with 1,277 new cases of suspected infections, and 114 fatality ( out of which 108 in Hubei Province. 1,779 patients were released from hospitals after being cured. 25,318 people who had had close contact with infected patients were freed from medical observation.

crowdtangle.post/message: Chinese Ambassador Cheng’s live interview with Sky: It's all natural and reasonable for countries to take enhanced measures or screening measures. But at the same time you have to be cool headed and not to be panic. We are deeply disappointed over the restrictive measures that have been taken by the Australian government, because as I see it, they are out of proportion. The decision is inconsistent with the professional recommendations of WHO. They disapprove of any measures that would unnecessarily interfere with international travel or trade. We have expressed our strong wish and hope that the Australian government in their next review will take into account all situations and take a balanced approach and to positively consider removing those harsh restrictions, at least relaxing restrictions. Read more of Amb. Cheng's interview with Sky chief anchor Kieran Gilbert: https://www.skynews.com.au/details/_6133057855001

The decision is inconsistent with the professional recommendations of WHO. They disapprove of any measures that would unnecessarily interfere with international travel or trade. We have expressed our strong wish and hope that the Australian government in their next review will take into account all situations and take a balanced approach and to positively consider removing those harsh restrictions, at least relaxing restrictions. Read more of Amb. Cheng's interview with Sky chief anchor Kieran Gilbert: https://www.skynews.com.au/details/_6133057855001 China’s ambassador to Australia Cheng Jingye has called on Australia to remove “harsh” travel ban restrictions in the wake of the deadly coronavirus outbreak. In an exclusive interview with Sky News Chief Anchor Kieran Gilbert, Mr Cheng said the travel ban “unnecessarily” interfered with t...
combined/text: Chinese Ambassador Cheng’s live interview with Sky: It's all natural and reasonable for countries to take enhanced measures or screening measures. But at the same time you have to be cool headed and not to be panic. We are deeply disappointed over the restrictive measures that have been taken by the Australian government, because as I see it, they are out of proportion. The decision is inconsistent with the professional recommendations of WHO. They disapprove of any measures that would unnecessarily interfere with international travel or trade. We have expressed our strong wish and hope that the Australian government in their next review will take into account all situations and take a balanced approach and to positively consider removing those harsh restrictions, at least relaxing restrictions. Read more of Amb. Cheng's interview with Sky chief anchor Kieran Gilbert: https://www.skynews.com.au/details/_6133057855001

crowdtangle.post/message: ＃疫情通报 ＃新型冠状病毒肺炎 2月19日0-24时，31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告新增确诊病例394例，新增死亡病例114例（湖北108例，河北、上海、福建、山东、云南、陕西各1例），新增疑似病例1277例。 当日新增治愈出院病例1779例，解除医学观察的密切接触者25318人，重症病例减少113例。 截至2月19日24时，据31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告，现有确诊病例56303例（其中重症病例11864例），累计治愈出院病例16155例，累计死亡病例2118例，累计报告确诊病例74576例（江西、河南、云南省各核减1例），现有疑似病例4922例。累计追踪到密切接触者589163人，尚在医学观察的密切接触者126363人。 #Notification #CoronaVirus On February 19, 31 provinces (autonomous regions and municipalities) and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps reported 394 newly confirmed cases, 114 new deaths (108 in Hubei, each 1 in Hebei, Shanghai, Fujian, Shandong, Yunnan and Shaanxi), and 1,277 new cases were suspected. 1,779 new cases were cured and discharged. 25,318 people were released from medical observation. 113 severe cases decreased. As of 24:00 on February 19, there were 56,303 confirmed cases (among which 11,864 severe cases), 16,155 people had been discharged from hospital after recovery, 2,118 cases of death and 4,922 suspected cases. The National Health and Health Commission had received a total of 74,576 confirmed cases (each 1 case decreased in Jiangxi, Henan and Yunnan after verification). 589,163 close contacts had been tracked. 126,363 people were receiving medical observation.

crowdtangle.post/message: #Shanghai has taken measures to facilitate exit and entry services for foreigners in the city amid the novel coronavirus outbreak. Facilitated measures include offering green passages and instant services for foreigners in need of urgent visa services due to epidemic prevention and control, such as the delay of business resumption or days of in-house quarantine.

crowdtangle.post/message: Chinese President Xi Jinping on Friday urged to improve medical insurance and aid system for major diseases, stressing that ensuring the safety and health of the people is the major task. Xi, also general secretary of the Communist Party of China (CPC) Central Committee and chairman of the Central Military Commission, specified the requirements at the 12th meeting of the central committee for deepening overall reform, which he chairs.

crowdtangle.account/name: Embassy of the People's Republic of China in Barbados

crowdtangle.post/message: Chinese Ambassador Dr. Zhao Yanbo Encourages Botswana Student in Wuhan to Face the Epidemic Bravely On 13th February 2020, Chinese Ambassador H.E. Dr. Zhao Yanbo made a phone call to one of the Botswana students in Wuhan to learn about her current status and gave his regards and encouragement. The student said: “I have stayed in my dorm since the inception of this outbreak. We are told not to go outside, but I know this is to prevent us from being exposed to the virus.” The student also mentioned that all the Botswana students in Wuhan have received care and help from their universities. They are safe and healthy, with sufficient supply of food, life necessities and medical materials. They also have internet, WeChat app and Whatsapp for accessing the latest information and keeping in touch with family and friends. Ambassador Zhao emphasized that putting the life and health of Chinese and foreign nationals in the country as the first priority, the Chinese government is doing its best to care for Botswana students in China as its own and make sure they have all they need during their study in China. Ambassador Zhao said: “I am, like your parents, following the development of the epidemic every day and paying close attention to your status. Till today, the number of new confirmed cases outside Hubei has seen a 10-day decline. Cure rates have kept rising. And more and more patients have been cured and discharged from hospital. These figures and facts show that the epidemic is totally controllable and curable. As new effective drugs are being developed, Please rest assured that China has every confidence, capacity and determination to win a full victory against the epidemic very soon.” Ambassador Zhao also encouraged the student to stay brave and face the epidemic bravely by following the guidance from local authorities and the university. He advised all the Botswana students in Wuhan to take preventative measures such as washing hands frequently, wearing a mask outdoors and staying away from unnecessary gathering in order to avoid cross infection. “Do take good care of yourselves”, Ambassador Zhao said.

crowdtangle.post/message: The 17 Chinese sailors stranded on ship at Chattogram coast will land this morning and fly back tonight to their home thanks to efforts by the esteemed Foreign Ministry #mofabdpage and other authorites of Bangladesh after the Embassy's interviene. The sailors who have been stuck in a ship docked at Sitakunda coast in Chattogram could not come out of the ship as the Bangladesh government has suspended on-arrival visa facilities to Chinese citizens after the recent outbreak of the epidemic.

crowdtangle.post/message: Disease is not to be feared, but the heart. Difficulity is not terrible, terrible is alienation. Disaster is not problem, problem is the rumor beguiling people. Are our bodies sick in the epidemic, or our hearts? The disease should be taken seriously, not discriminated against. In fact, disease are not the fault of human, but discrimination and unfair treatment are the vices. Let us work together to put aside prejudice and fight this epidemic together. Come on Wuhan, come on China。 疾病不可怕，可怕的是人心。困难不可怕，可怕的是疏离。灾难不可怕，可怕的是谣言蛊惑人心。面对疫情，生病的究竟是身体，还是人心？人们应该对肺炎疫情引起重视，而绝非歧视。事实上，疾病并非人类的过错，但是歧视与不公平待遇才是恶习。让我携手努力，摒弃偏见，共同对抗 #疫情。 #武汉加油 #中国加油 #StayStrongWUhan #StayStrongChina

crowdtangle.post/message: 【WHO Director-General's opening remarks at the technical briefing on 2019 novel coronavirus】 we reiterate our call to all countries not to impose restrictions inconsistent with the International Health Regulations. Such restrictions can have the effect of increasing fear and stigma, with little public health benefit. Read more：https://www.who.int/dg/speeches/detail/who-director-general-s-opening-remarks-at-the-technical-briefing-on-2019-novel-coronavirus

crowdtangle.post/message: In the face of the #2019nCoV outbreak, we need to stay calm and united, avoid panic and stigma, let science and facts prevail, and join hands to overcome the difficulties.
crowdtangle.post/allText:
In the face of the #2019nCoV outbreak, we need to stay calm and united, avoid panic and stigma, let science and facts prevail, and join hands to overcome the difficulties. Q: Is it safe to receive a letter or a package from China?
A: Yes, it is safe. People receiving packages from China are not at risk of contracting 2019-nCoV.
From previous analysis, we know coronaviruses do not survive long on objects, such as letters or packages. Is it safe to receive a letter or a package from China? Yes, it is safe. People receiving packages from China are are not at risk of contracting the new new coronavirus. From previous analysis, we know coronaviruses do not survive long on objects, such as letters or packages. +Yt Yက World Health Organization
combined/text: In the face of the #2019nCoV outbreak, we need to stay calm and united, avoid panic and stigma, let science and facts prevail, and join hands to overcome the difficulties.

crowdtangle.post/message: A total of 16 foreigners in China have contracted the novel #coronavirus, two of them have been cured and discharged from hospital, and the remaining 14 are in quarantine and in a stable condition, foreign ministry spokesperson Hua Chunying said on Monday.

A total of 16 foreigners in China have contracted the novel #coronavirus, two of them have been cured and discharged from hospital, and the remaining 14 are in quarantine and in a stable condition, foreign ministry spokesperson Hua Chunying said on Monday. A total of 16 foreigners in China have contracted the novel #coronavirus, two of them have been cured and discharged from hospital, and the remaining 14 are in quarantine and in a stable condition, foreign ministry spokesperson Hua Chunying said on Monday.

crowdtangle.post/message: Fighting NC with Great Determination：New Hospital with Capacity of 1000 Beds Built Within 10 days in Wuhan. Approved by Chairman of the Central Military Commission Xi Jinping, 1,400 medical staff from the armed forces are tasked with treating patients in Huoshenshan Hospital in Wuhan starting from Monday. Huoshenshan Hospital, with a capacity of 1,000 beds, is a makeshift hospital dedicated to treating patients infected with the novel coronavirus. The medics consist of 950 people from hospitals affiliated to the People's Liberation Army (PLA) Joint Logistic Support Force, and 450 from medical universities of the army, navy and air force of the PLA who were sent to Wuhan earlier. Meanwhile, a joint expert group of 15 people has also been set up to guide the hospital's epidemic prevention and control on the spot. Among the military medical staff, many participated in the fight against SARS in Xiaotangshan Hospital in Beijing or in the anti-Ebola mission in Sierra Leone and Liberia, and have rich experience in treating infectious diseases.

crowdtangle.post/message: 【Foreign Ministry Spokesperson Hua Chunying's Remarks on WHO Declaring Pneumonia Outbreak Caused by Novel Coronavirus Public Health Emergency of International Concern】 Q: WHO Director-General Dr. Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus declared the pneumonia outbreak caused by the novel coronavirus a public health emergency of international concern (PHEIC). What's your comment? A: Since the outbreak of the novel coronavirus epidemic, the Chinese government has been taking the most comprehensive and rigorous prevention and control measures with a high sense of responsibility for people's health. Many of these measures go well beyond the requirements of the International Health Regulations. We have full confidence and capability to win this fight against the epidemic. At the same time, acting with openness, transparency and a responsible attitude, the Chinese side informed relevant sides and shared the genome sequence of the coronavirus in a timely manner. WHO and many countries have recognized and commended this. China has been in close communication and cooperation with WHO. WHO experts recently conducted a field trip to Wuhan. Director-General Dr. Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus also visited China and discussed containment and mitigation of the 2019-nCoV with the Chinese side. He commends China's efforts and speaks highly of China's great contribution to the world by fighting against the novel coronavirus. China will continue working with WHO and other countries to safeguard regional and global public health security.

crowdtangle.post/message: WHO Director-General Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus said the WHO and the international community speak highly of and fully affirm the decisive measures the Chinese government has taken, and appreciate China's great efforts in curbing the spread of pneumonia. He said the WHO does not recommend the evacuation of nationals, and called on the international community to remain calm and not overreact. The WHO is confident in China's epidemic prevention and control ability. http://www.xinhuanet.com/english/2020-01/28/c_138739356.htm

He said the WHO does not recommend the evacuation of nationals, and called on the international community to remain calm and not overreact. The WHO is confident in China's epidemic prevention and control ability. http://www.xinhuanet.com/english/2020-01/28/c_138739356.htm BEIJING, Jan. 28 (Xinhua) -- The chief of the World Health Organization (WHO) Tuesday said the WHO speaks highly of the decisive measures the Chinese government has taken and is confident in China's epidemic prevention and control ability.

crowdtangle.post/message: 除夕[chú xī]: Lunar New Year's Eve, the last day of the old year, is one of China's most important traditional holidays. Homes are spotless in and out, doors and windows are decorated with brand new Spring Festival couplets, New Year's pictures, hangings, and images of the Door God, and everyone dresses up in new holiday clothes that are decorated with lucky patterns and auspicious colors. #EasyChinese

crowdtangle.post/message: The Chinese folk song Jasmine Flower (Molihua) is one of the most widely-known Chinese music pieces that dates back to the 18th century. Artists from KTM Choir, joined by their Chinese counterpart, are performing Jasmine Flower in Chinese. When you hear the elegant melody, you could see the blossoming flowers, just like the ever-closer friendship between China and Botswana. #ChinaBotswana45

crowdtangle.post/message: We know North Pole and South Pole,but where is the Third Pole of our earth? Yes,it’s the Tibetan Plateau,water towers of Asia and hosts numerous glaciers, lakes and rivers. Chinese Academy of Sciences (CAS) launched a Program of Pan-Third Pole Environment Study for a Green Silk Road (Pan-TPE). Anchored in the field of environmental sustainability, the Pan-TPE program is designed to integrate basic science, applied studies, technology innovation and policy-advising. It is the program’s ambition to explain environmental changes across Pan-Third Pole and their implications, to provide solutions to environmental challenges in high-priority projects, and to explore pathways for sustainable development along the Silk Road.

crowdtangle.post/message: In early December 2019, a fire incident broke out at the Ministry of Fisheries, Water Resources and National Assembly Matters of The Gambia, burnt nearly all the office appliances, computers and files. As a gesture of friendship and goodwill to support its relief efforts, the Chinese Embassy decided to donate a batch of office equipment and supplies to the Ministry. The donation ceremony of office equipment and supplies was held in banjul on January 6, 2020. H.E Vice President Dr. Isatou Touray, Hon. James Gomez and H.E Ambassador Ma Jianchun honored the ceremony and delivered their remarks.

crowdtangle.post/message: Today is Chinese Laba Festival (Chinese: 腊八), which is regarded as the prelude to the coming Lunar New Year. The 12th lunar month in Chinese is called la yue, so the eighth day of this month is la yue chu ba, or laba. The custom of eating porridge at Laba is well-established in history. The main ingredients of the Laba porridge are rice and sticky rice; people also add sugar, red dates, lotus seeds, walnuts, chestnuts, almonds, longans, hazelnuts, raisins, red beans, peanuts, water caltrops, roseleaf and others to make the porridge special. #TastyChina

crowdtangle.post/message: #GreenChina #ClimateChange As the most populous and largest developing country in the world, China firmly upholds multilateralism and has always been an active participant and defender of multilateral efforts to address climate change. By December 2018, China had cut its carbon emission by 45.8 percent from the 2005 level, meeting its 2020 carbon target, which aims to lower emissions by 40 to 45 percent ahead of schedule. What do you think of China's role in tackling climate change? Check out what delegates to the UN climate conference in Madrid have to say.#GreenChina http://www.xinhuanet.com/english/2019-12/12/c_138626596.htm
crowdtangle.post/allText: #GreenChina #ClimateChange As the most populous and largest developing country in the world, China firmly upholds multilateralism and has always been an active participant and defender of multilateral efforts to address climate change. By December 2018, China had cut its carbon emission by 45.8 percent from the 2005 level, meeting its 2020 carbon target, which aims to lower emissions by 40 to 45 percent ahead of schedule. crowdtangle.post/message: Chinese State Councilor and Foreign Minister #WangYi said, this year marks the 70th anniversary of diplomatic ties between #China and #Russia. The relationship has broken new ground in a number of areas: there has been a new characterization of our bilateral relations; practical cooperation has made new breakthroughs; friendly exchanges have made new progress; and strategic coordination has reached a new level. In the world today, the China-Russia relationship is the closest, strongest, most mature and most stable one between two major countries. It sets a high standard and a prime example for harmonious co-existence and win-win cooperation between countries. However, the China-Russia relationship has not reached its full potential and there are still rooms for improvements. There is no limit to our cooperation and we must always strive to expand it.

crowdtangle.post/message: #chinesekongfu in southwest China's Sichuan Province, Mount Emei is renowned for its beautiful and fairy-like sceneries, often being dubbed the "Most beautiful mountain in the country." Besides the landscape, Mount Emei has a rich culture of martial arts, including the traditional Emei Fist. Created by a martial artist named Situ Xuankong, the Fist originated in the Spring and Autumn Period and the Warring States Period, nearly 3,000 years ago. The Emei Fist emphasizes the use of palms and fingers. The smaller the target area, the greater the force used. The fluid moves alternate between slow and fast, deceptive and real, allowing the fighter to conquer the enemy effortlessly and elegantly. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xBbB9yKq5EY

crowdtangle.post/message: Chinese naval hospital ship Peace Ark visited Timor-Leste in December 2017, which provided medical services to 7,289 Timorese patients.It is an old friend of the people of Timor-Leste.
crowdtangle.post/allText:
Chinese naval hospital ship Peace Ark visited Timor-Leste in December 2017, which provided medical services to 7,289 Timorese patients.It is an old friend of the people of Timor-Leste. Chinese naval hospital ship #PeaceArk on Friday was bestowed the title of "role model of the times" in recognition of its outstanding service.

Since it entered service about a decade ago, Peace Ark has fulfilled voyages coded as Mission Harmony, visited 43 countries and regions, and provided medical services for more than 230,000 people, covering a distance of over 240,000 nautical miles.
combined/text: Chinese naval hospital ship Peace Ark visited Timor-Leste in December 2017, which provided medical services to 7,289 Timorese patients.It is an old friend of the people of Timor-Leste.

crowdtangle.post/message: #Berlin Zoo’s twin panda cubs #MengXiang and #MengYuan are nominated as finalists of “panda cub of the year”, a category under the Giant Panda Global Awards this year. crowdtangle.post/message: Since Macao's return to China in December 1999, the exchanges and cooperation in the field of education between the mainland and Macao have been marked by mutual complementary and coordinated development, said Vice Minister of Education #TianXuejun.This serves a vivid embodiment of the strengths of the policy of "one country, two systems," Tian said in an interview with Xinhua.There has been deeper #science and #technology exchanges and cooperation between higher education institutions of Macao and the mainland, with joint efforts in the establishment of innovation centers and joint laboratories.

crowdtangle.post/message: In 2018, Xinjiang initiated a three-year poverty-relief plan for the four regions in southern Xinjiang -- Aksu, Kashgar, Hotan and the Kirgiz Autonomous Prefecture of Kizilsu. Thanks to a series of job creation programs, poor residents in these areas can find jobs in nearby industrial parks and "satellite factories" or migrate to larger cities in or outside Xinjiang. The story in this vedio shows a Xinjiang villager Uxur who has lifted herself and her family out of poverty thanks to the local supportive policies. http://www.xinhuanet.com/english/2019-12/09/c_138617437.htm 家庭人多地少、缺少劳动技能、难寻就业岗位，曾是南疆一些贫困农民面临的生存困境。新疆通过实施长期、有序的就业扶贫行动，近两年已帮助十余万农村富余劳动力实现就业，转型成为有技能、有工作、有稳定收入的产业工人。视频中的乌苏尔便是其中一位。 http://www.xinhuanet.com/2019-12/11/c_1125332787.htm

crowdtangle.post/message: Ms. Zhang, who were tourists from #Taiwan, China, said that she had noted the smear campaign by Western media and politicians accusing #Xinjiang of genocide against #Uygur culture. However, from what she saw in Xinjiang, she could tell that the accusation was far from true. Ms. Zhang, a folk culture fan herself, had traveled with a tour group around northern Xinjiang last year. Impressed by the trip, she decided to visit southern Xinjiang this year along with her husband. She believes that Xinjiang is an amazing place where you always want “one more visit” no matter how many times you have been there. Ms. Zhang said she had seen a stable and harmonious Xinjiang, and she could feel it by either taking Urumqi #subway and visiting the bustling International Grand Bazaar. More detail: https://tinyurl.com/yx3g9amp

crowdtangle.post/message: China hopes to settle trade issues with the United States as soon as possible in a way that satisfies both sides, assistant commerce minister #RenHongbin recently said. China hopes the two sides will advance trade consultations in line with the principles of equality and mutual respect, take into account each other's core concerns and achieve satisfactory results as soon as possible, said Ren. The nature of Sino-US #economic and #trade cooperation is mutually beneficial, Ren said during a press briefing in #Beijing. Since early October, China and the US have been negotiating a phase one dealaimed at de-escalating the prolonged trade dispute. The US is scheduled to impose another round of tariffs against Chinese goods on Dec 15. #ChinaUStrade

crowdtangle.post/message: G20 should take lead in championing multilateralism: Chinese state councilor NAGYA, Japan, Nov. 23 (Xinhua) -- Chinese State Councilor and Foreign Minister Wang Yi said here on Saturday that the Group of 20 (G20) should take the lead in championing multilateralism. Addressing the G20 Foreign Ministers' Meeting, Wang said the global economic momentum is slowing with increased downside risks, and the world is full of uncertainties with growing unilateralism and protectionism. "We can not sit by idly and should take actions," he said, noting that multilateralism is key to solving various global issues. As a major forum for international economic cooperation, G20 should take the lead in championing multilateralism and offering feasible solutions for the healthy development of world economy, Wang said. Multilateralism, based on international law and basic principles of international relations, is aimed at maintaining world peace and common development, safeguarding equality and justice, and promoting mutual benefit and win-win, he said.

crowdtangle.post/message: 40 years ago, China and the US restored the educational exchanges which has benefited millions. The first group of 52 Chinese students started their journey in the US in 1979. Now in the 2018-19 school year, the number of higher education students from China in the US was 369,548, comprising 33.7 percent of the 1.09 million international students in the US. The first group of 8 American students arrived in China in 1979 and nearly 330,000 American students have studied in China over the past 40 years. #40YearsOn

crowdtangle.post/message: Chinese Embassy Donated to the World Prematurity Day Commemoration On 22 November 2019, the World Prematurity Day Commemoration was held by Princess Marina Hospital in Gaborone. The Assistant Minister of Health and Wellness, Hon. Bob Sethomo Lelatisitswe delivered speech and the hospital representatives introduced the information and knowledge on prematurity to the public in the Commemoration. To support this event, the Chinese Embassy donated 15,000 of nappies, baby clothes, cotton wool and baby cream to the families with preterm babies. The Economic and Commercial Counsellor of the Chinese Embassy Mr. Yang Xunlei attended the function.

crowdtangle.post/message: China had a total of 173,300 #elderly-care service institutions and facilities at the end of June, and over 140,000 were at the community level. Over half of the institutions nationwide are privately run, and in #Shanghai and #Beijing, privately run elderly-care institutions account for over 80 percent of the total. China has also been working to improve the quality of elderly-care services while providing more funding. Over 5 billion yuan (about 712.26 million U.S. dollars) in annual central government funding has also been provided for the sector since 2016, private investment from society has also been booming.

crowdtangle.post/message: Chinese President #XiJinping opened the second China International Import Expo (#CIIE) with a promise to ease market access, counter protectionism and boost economic globalization. "Of the problems confronting the world economy, none can be resolved by a single country alone," Xi said in a keynote speech at the CIIE opening ceremony in Shanghai. "We must all put the common good of humanity first rather than place one's own interest above the common interest of all." The Chinese president urged countries to tear down walls rather than build them, and "work together to make the pie of the global market even bigger." Xi added that China will pursue five key measures to further open up its market, seek high-quality bilateral and multilateral trade deals and work with other countries to achieve development for all. #CIIE2019 Read the full text: http://bit.ly/34zSCBe

"We must all put the common good of humanity first rather than place one's own interest above the common interest of all." The Chinese president urged countries to tear down walls rather than build them, and "work together to make the pie of the global market even bigger." Xi added that China will pursue five key measures to further open up its market, seek high-quality bilateral and multilateral trade deals and work with other countries to achieve development for all. #CIIE2019 Read the full text: http://bit.ly/34zSCBe Chinese President Xi Jinping opened the second CIIE on Tuesday with a promise to ease market access, counter protectionism and boost economic globalization.

crowdtangle.post/message: The largest crane in the world has come to KSA! This 4000-ton crawler crane, designed by XCMG and Sinopec from China, has successfully hoisted close to 2000 tons of scrubbing towers in the Jubail Industrial Zone of Damman Province. This is another example of Chinese and Saudi companies joining hands to build a shared future for the two peoples. See XCMG’s 4000 ton crawler crane in Damman on Oct.24. @Sinopec （Source of pictures: Sinopec）

crowdtangle.post/message: #ChinaNews: "Over the past four decades, China-US relations have made incredible progress with close economic ties and robust people-to-people exchanges. As we share strong interests in a peaceful and prosperous world, our needs for collaboration and cooperation have become unparalleled in our history", Cui Tiankai, the Chinese ambassador to the United States, said on Monday. "I hope that America's policies on China will be based on reason and reality, and not be led astray by bigotry and misjudgment," Ambassador Cui pointed out. "We firmly believe that developing friendship and cooperation remains a predominant choice of our people, and it is also the only right option for us. To stir up confrontation and hatred between the two peoples hurts their fundamental interests and will enjoy no popular support. No scheme that goes against the will of the people will ever last." Ambassador Cui made the remarks at a symposium on the 40 years of U.S.-China ties held by the George H. W. Bush Foundation for U.S.-China Relations, also known as the Bush China Foundation. For full report: https://dwz.cn/AIkTwSoX

crowdtangle.post/message: #茶，是中国的一个具有代表性的饮料。中国人常以茶来招待客人，而伴茶的茶点也是必不可少的。在 #扬州 的福春茶社里就有300多种不一样的茶点任君挑选。你想先来杯茶还是一份茶点呢？#以茶会友 #Tea is a representative drink in China. China people often use tea to entertain guests and friends, and pastries are the best partner of all kinds of tea. In FuChun Tea House in Yangzhou, there are more than 300 different pastries to choose from. So, pastries,tea or both? #TforTea

crowdtangle.post/message: 长江后浪推前浪，中国国粹流传几千年代代相传，其中 #京剧 最广为人知。新一代的年轻人是未来国粹传承的希望。 China traditional quintessence spread over thousands of generations, among which #PekingOpera is the most widely known. The new generation is the hope for the future inheritance of traditional quintessence.

crowdtangle.post/message: China's 🇨🇳 business environment showed one of the strongest performances worldwide in the last year, the World Bank Group has noted in a report. This is the second year that China joined the group of the world's top 10 most improved economies. The report credited China with improving protections for investors, strengthening procedures for enforcing contracts and making trade easier. See more at the link below 👇 https://bit.ly/365Up2t

This is the second year that China joined the group of the world's top 10 most improved economies. The report credited China with improving protections for investors, strengthening procedures for enforcing contracts and making trade easier. See more at the link below 👇 https://bit.ly/365Up2t China's business environment showed one of the strongest improvements worldwide in the 12 months ending May 1 thanks to its robust reform agenda, the World Bank Group said on Thursday.

crowdtangle.post/message: #ChinaNews:Twin #pandas were born in the Chengdu Research Base of Giant Panda Breeding in Sichuan province recently. The 13-year-old panda, Xiaoyatou, became a mother for the fourth time last Friday. The cubs weighed 176.6 grams and 131.4 grams at birth. Both the mother and cubs are in stable conditions.

crowdtangle.post/message: The effort to improve connectivity & cooperation on a transcontinental scale through BRI has been successful. According to the Ministry of Commerce, Non-financial ODI in 164 countries & regions amounted to 555.11 billion yuan (U.S78.5 billion), up 3.8 percent year on year. Chinese companies enhanced cooperation with countries participating in the BRI during the first nine months, adding a total of U.S10.04 billion of new investment in 56 countries in the initiative, accounting for 12.4 percent of the total ODI #newglobalisation #winwin.
